markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tooth and Claw Tattoo](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2219)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 122 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tattoo resembles an animal's fangs, claws, or similar natural weapons, letting you wield such weapons and turn into the same beast. When you receive the tattoo, choose the animal from among the following: ape, bear, bull, canine, cat, deer, frog, shark, or snake. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with animals of that kind. This tattoo is usually located on the body part or parts it's meant to transform—on the back of the hands for claws, around the mouth for jaws, on the forehead for horns, and so on.

<document level="2" id="action-1712" />

<document level="2" id="action-1713" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Tooth and Claw Tattoo
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 122 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Tooth and Claw Tattoo (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 122 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The tattoo casts 4th-level _animal form_ instead of 3rd.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Tooth and Claw Tattoo (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 122 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The tattoo casts 5th-level _animal form_ instead of 3rd.
